name: Gorebyss
text: His body is durable enough to withstand high-pressure levels in the deep sea. Do not confuse with HBase, Couchbase, MeshBase, Graphbase or KirbyBase.

name: Space
text: A space is a content repository. Think of it as a place to keep all the content related to one project. Each space has its own content model, content base and users permissions.

name: Symbol field
text: A symbol field is the same as a short text field.

name: Geodude
text: Geodude is a hard rock pokemon immune to one hit ko, not like my Hadoop cluster. Unlike Geode which make you more confused about big data.

name: Fit
text: To change the way your image responds to the w and h parameters, attach the fit parameter to the assetâ€™s url
